p: The major constituents from 47 ones, identified from the EOs of P. heldreichii in needles and twigs, respectively are: limonene (43.9% and 64.2%); germacrene D (17.2% and 2%); α-pinene (10.6, and 14.3%); ( E)-caryophyllene (4.4% and 0.3%); caryophyllene oxide (3.1% and 2.1%); α-humulene (2.1% and 1%). The constituents identified represent 95.1% and 96.8% of the total oils in needles and twigs.
